DEPP




(Depp is struck by the disks but ignores them...)

  ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
  From: rAuq 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday=
, July 08, 2001 11:24 PM
  Subject: Clash


  --- Lokk / Axis / Lynxiz ---
=

  Lynxiz quickly flattens herself to the ground, avoiding most of the 
  w=
ildly fired shots though in her dodging efforts, several bullets dug 
  int=
o her armour, and glanced off of her back. She stays on the 
  ground, and =
notices Nightlight being approached by Depp. A 
  growing sense of doom bui=
lds as she gets to her feet and fires two 
  disks at Depp. Immediately aft=
er firing the disks, she puts her gun 
  away and starts to sprint towards =
Depp thinking, <<I can't let this 
  happen...>> as she prepares for close =
combat mode. Her claws 
  extend from her hands with a metallic ringing. 

=
  Axis, not sure what to do, waits behind the pod, hoping that the 
  heavy=
 heat resistant re-entry armour on the pod will hold out for this 
  battle=
. Without looking, he yells, "LOKK?" Wanting to make sure 
  that Lokk is o=
k.

  Lokk creaps around, weaving through trees. Exiting the forest, he 
  =
hids behind a near by rock. Keeping low to the ground, he crawls 
  along s=
till trying to get behind the enemy and he's almost there.

   

  Your use=
 of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
